description: The job title is NLP engineer Remote, and the description is as follows: NLP Engineer: Collect and preprocess text data for language model training. Conduct data analysis to inform model development, prototyping in NLP, DL, ML, and computer vision using Pytorch and Python.SKILLS: NLP, Pytorch, Computer Vision, Python.
softSkills: Communication, Teamwork, Problem Solving, Time Management, Adaptability
